resources.string:
This is a short quiz, which aims to check 
your ability not only to learn to code well, 
but to keep smiling all the way through 
the Android Basic course by Udacity.

Answer questions carefully, 
get 1 point for each correct answer. 
Let's start from the trickiest one! 
Good luck!
"Beautiful name and amazing start! \n You get "
" point already! \nPlease, click check button to proceed."
You did not enter your name!
, your answer is empty! \nPlease, check at least one option.
, your answer is correct! \nYou get plus 1 point.\nClick check button to proceed.
, your answer is wrong! \nYou get 0 points.\nClick check button to proceed.
Do you really want to restart quiz? \nPlease, push back one more time.
2. Who welcomes students to Udacity and Google Developer Challenge Scholarship in introduction video? \n(please, check all correct answers)
3. Who was working on the course Android basics for a while and started Welcome to the Course video? \n(please, check all correct answers)
4. Who is the secret lady in the background?
5. What is basically the first step towards becoming Android developer?
6. What was Kunal learning and have to struggle?
7. What was Katherine learning and have to struggle?
9. Who was this really special quest?

You're just too marvelous,
Too marvelous for words
Like "\glorious", "glamorous"
And that old standby "amorous".

When you're smilin', when you're smilin'
The whole world smiles with you
But when you're cryin', you bring on the rain
So stop your sighin', be happy again!

Regrets, I've had a few
But then again, too few to mention
I did what I had to do
And saw it through without exemption.

That's life that's what people say
You're riding high in April
Shot down in May
But I know I'm gonna change that tune
When I'm back on top, back on top in June.

We're drinkin', my friend,
To the end of a brief episode
Make it one for my baby
And one more for the road.
Share this app with your friends
You have to try this app
Hello, look I found a nice quiz app, you can download it here: https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=1E4StGQCzEgnRXHsryzt4zeupK6gBvBpw
